traits.name: Toxic Mastery
entries: Lohezet ignores a creature's resistance to poison damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Lohezet makes three Withering Blast attacks and uses Miasma if it's available. He can replace one of the attacks with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Withering Blast
entries: {@atk ms,rs} +9 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. 18 (2d12 + 5 damage) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Miasma {@recharge 4}
entries: Lohezet magically conjures a billowing cloud of purple fog in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within 120 feet of himself. The area within the sphere is heavily obscured, and when a creature starts its turn in the sphere or enters the sphere for the first time on a turn, it must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 39 (6d12 damage) poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}. The cloud lasts for 1 minute, until Lohezet ends it early (no action required), or until Lohezet uses this action again. A strong wind disperses the cloud.
